attributes.action: We want the Government to take immediate action against climate change.
attributes.background: We want action because Climate Change is a very important issue that affects people and animals alike. As the world warms we slowly approach extinction and need change now.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may also wish to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231038 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234717 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231518 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/230041
